skins.selfIntroduction: I am Curacoa, light cruiser of the Royal Navy. I've served in several wars, so my combat experience is fairly rich. I hope that I'll be able to train some children to carry on our duty.
skins.acquisition: Though this is the first I'm meeting you, I can't help but to feel a sense of familiarity from the bottom of my heart... I am Curacoa - from now on, allow me handle the various affairs around port. Please look forward to it!
skins.login: All the preparations are complete, Commander. Please give your orders - I will delegate tasks to ensure that our missions get finished.
skins.details: It is said that a woman's charm is greatest when in front of a lens... Commander, I trust that you'll bring out my best side~
skins.secretaryIdle1: A fly? Don't worry, they'll disappear after a few moments~
skins.secretaryIdle2: To have a junior as exceptional as Belfast... I have to redouble my efforts~
skins.secretaryIdle3: I have already cleaned the office, Commander. I would imagine that having a comfortable work environment is of great importance to you.
skins.secretaryTouch: If there is anything you need, please call for me right away~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Are you trying to flirt with me? Perhaps... there might be a better place for that.

skins.shipDescription: It is my honour to be of everyone's service. Light cruiser Curacoa takes it upon herself to continue serving you, Master.
skins.acquisition: It is my honour to be of everyone's service. Light cruiser Curacoa takes it upon herself to continue serving you, Master.
skins.login: If you're still agonizing over today's itinerary, why not have have a cup of tea and reset yourself?
skins.details: Curley is always walking around with that stony expression... Maybe she and I have a different understanding of "how a maid ought to present herself?"
skins.secretaryIdle1: Seeing everyone's growth and maturity... somehow puts my mind at ease.
skins.secretaryIdle2: My abilities as an anti-air escort? Why, it's my next best thing, after being a maid of course.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Being in a room that has been cleaned properly will also clean your mind of distractions.
skins.secretaryTouch: You may give me orders at any time, Master.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Why don't we save these kinds of things for... after work?

skins.shipDescription: As I am but a maid, it is a great honor to be able to wear such a gorgeous outfit¡­ How do I look, Commander? "Not sure where to start feasting your eyes?" Oh my... Commander...
skins.acquisition: As I am but a maid, it is a great honor to be able to wear such a gorgeous outfit¡­ How do I look, Commander? "Not sure where to start feasting your eyes?" Oh my... Commander...
skins.login: Commander, it's been a long time since you've been able to enjoy a moment of rest, hasn't it?
skins.details: This outfit's design is rather bold... I'm more accustomed to my maid uniform...
skins.secretaryIdle1: My obligations as a maid do not end when I am not in my uniform. If you need anything, just let me know.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Everyone is busy with Spring Festival preparations... but I'd like to take this opportunity to slack off a little~
skins.secretaryIdle3: You'd like to know if there are any secrets behind the Dragon Empery's culinary and artistic crafts? Hehe, stay tuned~
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you want to rest in my lap? If you'd like, go ahead~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, I see that you've also become quite bold.
